argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumunsnf.0 | |- F/_ k Y |
| 2 |  | gsumunsnf.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsumunsnf.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | gsumunsnf.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 5 |  | gsumunsnf.a | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 6 |  | gsumunsnf.f | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. B ) |
| 7 |  | gsumunsnf.m | |- ( ph -> M e. V ) |
| 8 |  | gsumunsnf.d | |- ( ph -> -. M e. A ) |
| 9 |  | gsumunsnf.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 10 |  | gsumunsnf.s | |- ( k = M -> X = Y ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ k = M ) -> X = Y ) |
| 12 | 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 11, 1 | #P_gsumunsnfd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. ( A u. { M } ) |-> X ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) .+ Y ) ) |
